title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Intelligent Information Retrieval Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and foundational social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Most learners operate in PC-unavailable environments with smartphone-only access, aiming to enhance social problem-solving skills necessary for managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can search for social domain-specific information with 80% accuracy using the HIM-IR methodology in a mobile environment
Learners can propose three practical strategies for solving organizational management problems by analyzing information collected via mobile devices
Learners can complete at least one knowledge-sharing project by collaborating with peer leaders on a mobile learning platform

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
